body: Creatures with the arcane template are infused with arcane power, capable of casting a limited number of arcane spells. If the creature has 11 or more Hit Dice, this simple template grants a mythic rank of 2 instead of 1. An arcane creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
name: Arcane (MR 1 or 2, CR +1)
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Arcane (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)

sections.body: AC +2 deflection bonus; hp mythic bonus hit points; SR gains SR equal to its new CR + 11; Special Attacks mythic magic, simple arcane spellcasting.
